title: The Ballad of Sanjô Bridge
description: first section has two large characters and two vertical lines of smaller characters; three red seals on first section; second section has long, rather regular vertical lines of text, with images of branches and leaves in blue in background; third short section with 12 lines of text and two red seals; first and third sections are newer than second section
creditline: Gift of Stephen Addiss and Audrey Yoshiko Seo
